titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Select Committee on Energy Independence and Global Warming in the One Hundred Eleventh Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Select Committee on Energy Independence and Global Warming

bill.summary: 2/10/2009--Introduced. Provides amounts for the expenses of the House Select Committee on Energy Independence and Global Warming for the 111th Congress.
